short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create interactive Demos & guides instantly. Share and gather feedback

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Craft & share AI-powered interactive demos and step-by-step guides in minutes to boost conversions and drive adoption.

Interactive demos come with beautiful highlights, pointer arrows, and AI-generated text in seconds!
Tired of generic pitch decks? Let your product sell itself with interactive walkthroughs!
Documentation doesn't have to be hard!

20Paths helps you:
🪄 Capture interactive demos with editable images, without needing an image editor!
🪄 Document processes in minutes, which would otherwise take hours.
 🪄Engage prospects with interactive, self-guided experiences
🪄Track engagement and gather leads with built-in forms and CTAs
🪄 Create Help Centers instantly! Compile all your Demos in one place.

Start the extension, then interact with any web app as you normally would - no special effort is needed! 20Paths does all the work for you by meticulously arranging screenshots with suitable AI-generated text.

🙌🏻Personalize demos for each prospect with custom variables and logos.
And voila! Your process is well documented as an interactive demo.

Stand out from the competition:

✨ Edit everything! Customize the text, images, styling, annotations, and even add branding!
✨ Share demos instantly with a custom link or embed on your website
✨ Protect sensitive info with image masking features
✨ Integrate it! Demos are compatible across hundreds of platforms like Notion, Google Docs, MS Word, and anywhere where HTML and Markdown are supported.
✨ Add branching to allow users to experience different options at their pace and interest.
✨ Built-in CTAs and lead generation forms to collect user data. Gate demos until users provide necessary information.
✨ Share demos from your custom domain for a professional touch.

Create a Help Center with one click.
🚀 Compile your Demos into shareable Help Centers.
🚀 Help Centers can be embedded on any webpage, blog, or CMS.
🚀 Export as Widget to add anywhere you like!
🚀 Create a no-code help center in minutes to enhance customer satisfaction and reduce support team workload.

USE CASES
🎁 Demo your product -  Increase conversion rates with engaging, interactive product experiences
🎁 Shorten the sales cycle by letting prospects explore at their own pace
🎁 Create amazing customer onboarding and retention experiences
🎁 SOPs (Standard Operating Procedures)
🎁 Step-by-step interactive Demos
🎁 Streamline sales team onboarding and product training
🎁 Document any Process
🎁 Knowledge base Documentation
🎁 Share domain knowledge
🎁 How-to tutorials
🎁 Software training
